metadata.title: CVE-2011-3741 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Ganglia 3.1.7 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via adirect request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in anerror message, as demonstrated by host_view.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: ganglia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
